name: Factory

commentData.description: Use the Factory to create instances of Resource: transactions, participants and assets.

methods.name: constructor

commentData.description:
Create the factory.

Note: Only to be called by framework code. Applications should retrieve instances from {@link Hyperledger-Composer}

tags.title: param
tags.description: The ModelManager to use for this registry
tags.name: modelManager

description: Create the factory.
<strong>Note: Only to be called by framework code. Applications should
retrieve instances from {@link Hyperledger-Composer}

parameters.description: The ModelManager to use for this registry
parameters.name: modelManager

methods.name: newResource

commentData.description: Create a new Resource with a given namespace, type name and id

tags.title: param
tags.description:
pass true if you want the factory to
return a {@link Resource} instead of a {@link ValidatedResource}. Defaults to false.
tags.name: options.disableValidation

tags.title: param
tags.description:
Pass one of: <dl>
<dt>sample</dt><dd>return a resource instance with generated sample data.</dd>
<dt>empty</dt><dd>return a resource instance with empty property values.</dd></dl>
tags.name: options.generate

tags.title: param
tags.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
tags.name: options.includeOptionalFields

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the type is not registered with the ModelManager

description: Create a new Resource with a given namespace, type name and id

parameters.description:

return a {@link Resource} instead of a {@link ValidatedResource}. Defaults to false.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: options.generate

parameters.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
parameters.name: options.includeOptionalFields

description: the new instance

methods.name: newRelationship

commentData.description:
Create a new Relationship with a given namespace, type and identifier.
A relationship is a typed pointer to an instance. I.e the relationship
with namespace = 'org.acme', type = 'Vehicle' and id = 'ABC' creates`
a pointer that points at an instance of org.acme.Vehicle with the id
ABC.

tags.title: throws
tags.description: if the type is not registered with the ModelManager

description: Create a new Relationship with a given namespace, type and identifier.
A relationship is a typed pointer to an instance. I.e the relationship
with namespace = 'org.acme', type = 'Vehicle' and id = 'ABC' creates`
a pointer that points at an instance of org.acme.Vehicle with the id
ABC.
the new relationship instance

methods.name: newTransaction

commentData.description:
Create a new transaction object. The identifier of the transaction is
set to a UUID.

tags.title: param
tags.description:
an optional identifier for the transaction; if you do not specify
one then an identifier will be automatically generated.
tags.name: id

tags.title: param
tags.description:
Pass one of: <dl>
<dt>sample</dt><dd>return a resource instance with generated sample data.</dd>
<dt>empty</dt><dd>return a resource instance with empty property values.</dd></dl>
tags.name: options.generate

tags.title: param
tags.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
tags.name: options.includeOptionalFields

tags.title: return
tags.description: A resource for the new transaction.

description: Create a new transaction object. The identifier of the transaction is

one then an identifier will be automatically generated.

parameters.description: if options.generate is specified, whether optional fields should be generated.
